L

Library - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model
Library class models the whole library.
It has a collection of all books and all members (patrons) and can also hold other global library properties such as the maximum loan period in days.
Library() - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model.Library
 
LibraryData - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data
LibraryData class is responsible for loading data to and storing data from the library, using the text file storage.
LibraryData() - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data.LibraryData
 
LibraryException - Exception in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.main
LibraryException extends Exception class and is a custom exception that is used to notify the user about errors or invalid commands.
LibraryException(String) - Constructor for exception bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.main.LibraryException
 
ListBooks - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands
Lists the books that are in the library.
It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method list the books in the system.
It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "listbooks" command is given by the user.
ListBooks() - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands.ListBooks
 
ListLoans - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands
Lists all the loans currently in the system.

listPatrons() - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui.MainWindow
Creates a Table display view that lists all the unhidden "not deleted" patrons in the library systen.

Shows a list of all patrons of the library to the user.

loadData(Library) - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data.PatronDataManager
Loads data from 'patrons.txt'.
The method opens the file that holds the books data using the RESOURCES variable which stores the file path.
The method creates a Scanner object to read the opened file.

LoanDataManager - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data
This class is used to load and store data using the text file storage.
It is an implementation of the DataManager interface.
It has a RESOURCE field that holds the path to the text file (loans.txt) that will be used as storage for loans data.
The loadData(Library) method loads data from 'loans.txt' file to the library.
The storeData(Library) method stores the book data that exist in the library to 'loans.txt' file.
LoanDataManager() - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data.LoanDataManager
